title: Heidi
author: johanna-spyri
summary: The beloved tale of an orphan girl who goes to live with her grandfather in the Swiss Alps. One of the best-selling books ever written, it has been adapted into numerous films and television series.

attribution.note: Book data from Open Library (openlibrary.org), part of Internet Archive.

description:
***The famous Swiss classic about Heidi, a five-year-old orphan girl*** who goes to live with her grandfather, and his goats, in an alm (Alpine pasture)...up the Alps. **One of the most loved classics ...both by children and adults, alike.**
